title: 6: Ratio and Intellectus
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In this podcast, we discuss the ancient division between the two types of reason. Put simply, Intellectus refers to natural understanding or meditation, and Ratio refers to the working faculty of reason.
itunes:author: A.J. & Graeme
itunes:subtitle: A discussion of the dual intellect of man
itunes:summary: In this podcast, we discuss the ancient division between the two types of reason. Put simply, Intellectus refers to natural understanding or meditation, and Ratio refers to the working faculty of reason.
itunes:title: 6: Ratio and Intellectus
